name: Birth of a Hunter (itch)
description: Birth of a Hunter is a metroidvania style 2D platformer, with the twist that a huge new map is generated every time you start a new game. Get ready to explore different environments with their own dungeons to power yourself up and defeat bosses, all of which are randomly generated or selected. Unlock new games modes, such as rougelite style instant death, for an extra challenge. Made by a single hobbyist developer in his spare time.
